Type: Mine production: Ilmenite, titanium dioxide (TiO2) content.
Prod_notes: Rounded to the nearest 100,000 tons to avoid disclosing company proprietary data.
Reserves_notes: United States rutile production and reserves data are included with ilmenite.

Type: Mine production: Ilmenite, titanium dioxide (TiO2) content.
Reserves_notes: For Australia, Joint Ore Reserves Committee-compliant or equivalent reserves were estimated to be 43 million tons for ilmenite and 11 million tons for rutile, TiO2 content. Reserves for Australia, Canada, China, Kenya, Madagascar, Mozambique, South Africa, and “Other countries” were revised based on company and Government reports.
